content: pixel sleeve is a chunky knit laptop case that s quick to make and easy to customize worked in the round with minimal finishing it features a smooth stockinette body a simple buttoned flap and a cozy padded feel perfect for keeping your tech safe in style whether you re a beginner or just craving a fast satisfying project pixel sleeve delivers instant gratification and nostalgic charm the pattern includes five sizes to fit laptops from 13 to 17 33 43 cm and instructions for adjusting the length to your specific device **skills used ** working in the round simple decreases basic seaming mattress stitch buttonholes **yarn ** approx 150 yards 137 m super bulky yarn **construction ** knit in the round from the bottom up seamed shut with a flap worked flat **sizes included ** xs fits 13 laptops approx 12 × 8 5 / 30 5 × 21 5 cm s fits 14 laptops approx 12 5 × 9 / 31 7 × 23 cm m fits 15 laptops approx 13 5 × 9 5 / 34 3 × 24 cm l fits 16 laptops approx 14 × 10 / 35 6 × 25 4 cm xl fits 17 laptops approx 15 5 × 10 5 / 39 4 × 26 7 cm each size fits laptops within ±0 5 1 25 cm of listed dimensions instructions included for customizing width and length **yarn notes ** the sample was knit using malabrigo rasta 90 yds / 82 m per 150g skein in apple green you can also hold multiple strands of scrap yarn together as long as you meet gauge 10 sts × 16 row = 10 × 10 cm / 4 × 4
